fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 72.65 points or 0.37% to settle at 19,672.35. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 1.45% to 11.65. ITC, HDFC Bank, and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
